title: ollama/ollama
summary: The official Ollama CLI and server that lets you run Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally with a single command.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python library for Ollama; chat, embed, generate and pull models with a simple async/sync API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers via fetch.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain community integration that wraps Ollama models as LLMs and embedders for chains, agents and RAG.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (renamed to Open-WebUI); chat history, model management, RAG uploads, admin panel.

title: ollama4j – Java Client
summary: Unofficial Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with builder-style API and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community-built Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-copilot (vscode extension)
summary: VS Code extension bringing local Ollama models into inline completions and chat sidebar like GitHub Copilot.

title: ollama-cli (rich TUI)
summary: Terminal UI written in Go offering interactive model picker, chat threads and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-gui (Electron desktop)
summary: Lightweight cross-platform desktop app built with Electron for chatting with Ollama models.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Streamlit chat app that connects to local Ollama, shows token-per-second metrics and lets you switch models mid-chat.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset allowing Ollama models to be used as generators or rankers in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart to deploy Ollama server and models on Kubernetes with GPU support and PVC caching.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module that spins up Ollama as a service in CI pipelines for testing LLM-powered features.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community .NET SDK for Ollama supporting C# and F# with async enumerable streaming.

title: ollama-codex-cli
summary: Terminal tool inspired by OpenAI Codex that uses local Ollama models for shell command suggestions and code generation.

title: ollama discord bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that brings Ollama models into any server with slash commands and thread support.

title: ollama-rag-chatbot (Next.js)
summary: Next.js starter that combines Ollama, LangChain and ChromaDB to build a private RAG chatbot with PDF upload.

title: Ollama Reddit community
summary: Active subreddit for sharing models, troubleshooting, integrations and feature requests around Ollama.

title: Ollama on Hacker News
summary: Discussion thread comparing Ollama to llama.cpp and local LLM deployment strategies.
